mapper.insert: insert into screen values(NVL((select max(num) from screen),0)+1, #{multi_num}, #{movie_num}, #{show_date}, #{hour}, #{minute}, #{available_seat}, #{commit})
mapper.select: select s.* from (select * from screen order by num asc) s where multi_num=#{multi_num} and commit=1
select count(num) from screen where commit=0
select * from (select * from screen order by num asc) where commit=0
